translations.translation: those who will roast in the Greatest Fire
Who will burn in the terrible Fire,
He will be cast into the Great Fire.
and suffer the heat of the great fire
The one who will enter the biggest fire.
Who will enter the great Fire.
Who shall enter the great fire;
even he who shall roast in the Great Fire,
He who will be flung to the great Fire
who will enter the Great Fire,
He Who shall roast into the Great Fire,
—he who will enter the Great Fire,
Who will enter the Great Fire,
Who will enter the great Fire and made to taste its burning,
who will roast in the Great Fire,
He who will enter the Gigantic Fire.
[He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
[87:12] he who will be roasted in the greater Fire, the Fire of the Hereafter, the lesser fire being that of this world;
(He who will be flung to the great fire) he who will enter the Fire in the Hereafter, and there is no chastisement greater than the Fire

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى } ويدخل في النشأة الأخرى { ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ } [الأعلى: 12] التي هي بأضعاف نار الدنيا في الحرقة والحرارة، لذلك قال: " كبرى " أو في الدرك الأسفل منها وهو أكبرها
